name: mri_aparc2aseg
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Maps the cortical labels from the automatic cortical parcellation to the automatic segmentation volume.

inputs.description: Name of the subject as found in the SUBJECTS_DIR.
inputs.name: Subject name

inputs.description: Full path of file to save the output segmentation in. Default is mri/aparc+aseg.mgz
inputs.name: Output Volume File

inputs.description: Use mri/hemi.ribbon.mgz as a mask for the cortex
inputs.name: Old Ribbon Flag

inputs.description: Mask cortical voxels with mri/ribbon.mgz. Same as --volmask
inputs.name: New Ribbon Flag

inputs.description: Use ?h.aparc.a2005s.annot. Output will be aparc.a2005s+aseg.mgz.
inputs.name: A2005s Flag

inputs.description: Use ?h.aparc.a2009s.annot. Output will be aparc.a2009s+aseg.mgz.
inputs.name: A2009s Flag

inputs.description: Use annotname surface annotation. By default, uses ?h.aparc.annot.
inputs.name: Annotation Name

inputs.description: Annotation table file. Default is $FREESURFER_HOME/Simple_surface_labels2009.txt
inputs.name: Annotation Table

inputs.description: Add offset to all segmentation ids.
inputs.name: Base Offset

inputs.description: Re-assign white matter voxel labels to the closest cortical point if within distance.
inputs.name: Label WM Flag

inputs.description: Max distance (mm) from cortex to be labeled as gyral WM (default 5mm)
inputs.name: WM Parc DM

inputs.description: Do not label WM based on 'unknown' cortical label
inputs.name: Rip Unknown Flag

inputs.description: Label hypointensities as WM
inputs.name: Hypo as WM Flag

inputs.description: Do not remove unconnected regions from WM parahip
inputs.name: No Fix Parahip Flag

inputs.description: Change number of surface normal smoothing steps (default is 10).
inputs.name: Smooth Normals

inputs.description: Test mapping of column, row, slice
inputs.name: CRS Test

inputs.description: Only process the left hemisphere
inputs.name: Left Hemisphere Flag

inputs.description: Only process the right hemisphere
inputs.name: Right Hemisphere Flag

inputs.description: Run in parallel with the specified number of threads
inputs.name: Threads

inputs.description: Print out information on how to use this program
inputs.name: Help Flag

inputs.description: Print out version and exit
inputs.name: Version Flag
